price: Lakini wanao taka kinyume ya haya, basi hao ndio wanao ruka mipaka.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
footnotes: Basi mwenye kutafuta starehe ya maingiliano kwa wasio kuwa wake na masuria, basi hao tena ni wenye kuikiuka halali na kuingia katika haramu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
